post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
I've deleted the previous "mod list" topic in favor of the corresponding wiki page (hense the "2.0").

http://www.modwiki.net/wiki/Modlist

Do not send me PMs to add or remove links to this list.

The whole point is that anyone can make changes to the list, provided they've registered an account on the wiki.

It takes nothing more than a few minutes to register and nothing is required of you other than an email account.
